entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
